title: Our Last Mini Ep 12: Measure Your Life In Minis
itunes:title: Our Last Mini Ep 12: Measure Your Life In Minis
itunes:subtitle: **ANNOUNCEMENT: This will be the last mini for awhile! We’re taking a break to focus on Natch, Gee Thanks! and our Patreon, Just One Episode: https://www.patreon.com/justoneepisode**If we could only sit in a room and record together with no other ob...
description:
**ANNOUNCEMENT: This will be the last mini for awhile! We’re taking a break to focus on Natch, Gee Thanks! and our Patreon, Just One Episode: https://www.patreon.com/justoneepisode**


If we could only sit in a room and record together with no other obligations for the rest of our lives, we would! We are so appreciative of the support of everyone who has been on this ride with us, especially those who gave $2 on the Palette Patrons tier with nothing in return. 


To say thank you to the PPs we've opened up SPOILER ALERT (our third Just One Episode episode) for them. We said we'd open up the first episode but honestly we just love the third episode so much. 


And if you’d like to preview what Just One Episode is all about, we’re keeping that $2 tier open for you too! For a limited time, you will be able to access Just One Episode 3: SPOILER ALERT for $2/month. $8 gives you access to everything and you can upgrade anytime.


This isn't goodbye, it's just see you on the Patreon! We’d love to have you!

 

Measure your life in love,

Caroline and Jackie

 

***


Subscribe to Flavor of the Week, a weekly newsletter that tells you about one great product and where you can get it: https://geethanks.substack.com/


Shop all of the Gee Thanks! Recs: https://shoplist.us/geethanksjustboughtit

See our Amazon Store: www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit  


Follow Gee Thanks! On Instagram: https://instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
